mapper.select: SELECT TR_DT /*거래일자*/ , ACNO /*계좌번호*/ , TR_NO /*거래번호*/ , REL_TR_DT /*연계거래일자*/ , OPNT_ACNO /*상대계좌번호*/ , OPNT_TR_NO /*상대거래번호*/ , REL_COM_ACTNO /*연계기관계좌번호*/ , OPNT_ACT_NM /*상대계좌명*/ , REL_COM_CD /*연계기관코드*/ , OPRT_TR_DTM /*조작거래일시*/ FROM SB.RPD1010 /*연계거래내역*/ WHERE TR_DT = '${TR_DT}' AND ACNO = '${ACNO}' AND TR_NO = '${TR_NO}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SB.RPD1010 /*연계거래내역*/ ( TR_DT /*거래일자*/ , ACNO /*계좌번호*/ , TR_NO /*거래번호*/ , REL_TR_DT /*연계거래일자*/ , OPNT_ACNO /*상대계좌번호*/ , OPNT_TR_NO /*상대거래번호*/ , REL_COM_ACTNO /*연계기관계좌번호*/ , OPNT_ACT_NM /*상대계좌명*/ , REL_COM_CD /*연계기관코드*/ , OPRT_TR_DTM /*조작거래일시*/ ) VALUES ('${TR_DT}' , '${ACNO}' , '${TR_NO}' , '${REL_TR_DT}' , '${OPNT_ACNO}' , '${OPNT_TR_NO}' , '${REL_COM_ACTNO}' , '${OPNT_ACT_NM}' , '${REL_COM_CD}' , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') )
